tooltip.displayText: Kids Favourites Filter applied. Remove this filter to see the full Menu.

info.name: No Added Sugar Desi Malai Stick Kulfi 70ml
info.description: A creamy classic made with no added sugar, perfect for savouring without guilt.

info.name: No Added Sugar Kesar Pista Stick Kulfi 70ml
info.description: Enjoy the royal blend of Kesar and Pista, made with no added sugar for a wholesome treat.

info.name: No Added Sugar Dry Fruit Matka Kulfi (pack Of 2)
info.description: Packed with nutty dry fruits, this Matka Kulfi comes with no added sugar, making it indeed delicious.

info.name: Meetha Mazaa
info.description: Experience festival magic with the unique tastes of Calcutta Paan, Shahi Gulkand, Anjeer, and Gud Badam. These flavors capture the essence of India’s most beloved mithais, perfect for sharing festive joy!

info.name: Desi Malai Stick Kulfi
info.description: Serves 1 | The classic, authentic, rustic avatar of your favourite kulfi, in form of easy-to-devour slices. This one has been custom-made to deliver creamy perfection. Kcal/serving: 155

info.name: Kesar Pista Stick Kulfi
info.description: Serves 1 | Revisit childhood with this rich kulfi made with 100% Pure milk Rabdi slow-churned for hours, loaded with crunchy Pista & bits of Kesar! Kcal/serving: 161

info.name: Calcutta Paan Stick Kulfi
info.description: Serves 1 | Refreshingly famous at desi post meal sessions, Meetha Paan flavours with Saunf & Tutti-Frutti are folded into 100% Pure milk Rabdi slow-churned for hours.

info.name: Thandai Stick Kulfi
info.description: Serves 1 | Give-in to kulfi indulgence with this 100% Pure milk. Rabdi slow-churned for hours, made special with traditional Thandai & topped with Almond bits! Kcal/serving: 173

info.name: Shahi Gulkand Stick Kulfi
info.description: Serves 1 | This desi kulfi is folded with aromatic Gulkand into 100% Pure milk Rabdi slow-churned for hours. Kcal/serving: 161

info.name: Alphonso Mango Stick Kulfi
info.description: Serves 1 | Enjoy Summer-y Kulfi made with the King of Fruits -- Alphonso Mango pulp is combines with rich milk Rabdi, slow-churned for hours. Kcal/serving: 148

info.name: Anjeer Stick Kulfi
info.description: Serves 1 | This royal-like treat, is loaded with Anjeer (figs) folded into creamy 100% Pure milk Rabdi slow-churned for hours, fits perfectly for the small wins in life! Kcal/serving: 164

info.name: Gud Badaam Stick Kulfi
info.description: Serves 1 | "Walk down memory lane, with 100% Pure milk Rabdi slow-churned for hours, sweetened with Jaggery and loaded with Almonds. Enjoy the walk!" Kcal/serving: 161

info.name: Butterscotch Stick Kulfi
info.description: Serves 1 | Say Hi! to our kulfi made trendy, with crunchy Butterscotch bits folded into a creamy 100% Pure milk Rabdi slow-churned for hours. Kcal/serving: 163

info.name: Chocolate Stick Kulfi
info.description: Serves 1 | A Chocolate lover's delight, made special with decadent Chocolate folded into 100% pure milk Rabdi slow-churned for hours. Kcal/serving: 166

info.name: Gud Badaam Matka Kulfi (pack Of 2)
info.description: Serves 1 | A very unique combination of two contrasting tastes – the sweet jiggery and the crunchy almond – served in the soothing matka. Kcal/serving: 208

info.name: Shahi Gulkand Matka Kulfi (pack Of 2)
info.description: Serves 1 | The rosy refreshment of Gulkand, served in the traditional matka, to make your day all the more special, no matter what the occasion is. Kcal/serving: 198

info.name: Shahi Gulkand Slice (pack Of 3)
info.description: Serves 1 | If you’d like to experience the regal side of the good life, the Shahi Gulkand slice kulfi is an ideal pick that you can simply not afford to miss out on. Kcal/serving: 195

info.name: Desi Malai Slice Kulfi (pack Of 3)
info.description: Serves 1 | Pack of 3 Kulfi slices bundled for every occasion big or small! Enjoy our Desi Malai Kulfi in all its glory, 1 is just not be enough! Kcal/serving: 215

info.name: Choco+aam Jugalbandi Slice Kulfi (pack Of 3)
info.description: Serves 1 | 2 in 1 Kulfis are a careful balance of taste & flavour with the best of both worlds put together. Enjoy our Alphonso Mango & Sinful Chocolate Kulfi Jugalbandi. Kcal/serving: 218
